text: Channa auroflammea is a species of snakehead, a fish of the family Channidae. Its range includes Mekong River. It was previously lumped with C. marulius, C. cf. marulius, or C. aff. marulius, but can be distinguished within the group by colour pattern, other morphological characteristics, and genetic information. ==References== auroflammea Category:Fish of Southeast Asia Category:Fish described in 2019
title: Channa auroflammea
